FAQs

​

2. [Get a Pool Pass or Make a Park Reservation](https://www.oakridgenorth.com/parks-and-recreation)
3. [Pay a Court Fine or Pay a Utility Bill](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/oakridgenorthtx/utilities)
4. [Apply for a job](https://www.oakridgenorth.com/employment-opportunities)

27424 Robinson Road

Oak Ridge North, TX 77385

Main Line: 281-292-4648  
Municipal Court: 281-292-8736  
Municipal Court Fax: 281-364-7168

CONTACT POLICE & PUBLIC WORKS

27375 Spectrum Drive

Oak Ridge North, TX 77385

Main Line: 281-292-4648  
Police (non-emergency): 281-292-4643  
Police (24-hour dispatch): 936-538-5900  
Public Works (after hours): 281-939-3341
